attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With new D.N.A. science there is a 100% accuracy that the person or persons did the crime of murder so i think it is time to bring back capitol punishment it says in the bible eye for an eye life for a life, even the threat of the death sentance will be a deterant, or life should meen life not 12 years.
